thread.title: BRIEF-Tat Technologies Announces Appointment Of Chief Financial Officer

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Tat Technologies Announces Appointment Of Chief Financial Officer
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Tat Technologies Ltd:
* TAT TECHNOLOGIES ANNOUNCES APPOINTMENT OF CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER
* SAYS EHUD BEN YAIR APPOINTED CFO Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
